item.title: Video: John Resig - Testing, Performance Analysis, and jQuery 1.4
item.description: In case you hadn’t seen it yet, John Resig was kind enough to stop by Yahoo! for the December Bayjax meetup. Here’s the video: Usually developers are more interested in just getting the dang code to work, and as a result actual the testing and maintenance of JavaScript isn’t talked about too much, so I’m sure this will be new territory for many developers. And since it’s John Resig speaking, there was of course a bit about using TestSwarm, a testing distributed framework-agnostic automated testing tool (that’s a mouthful!

item.title: JavaScript Tidbit: Shorthand Object Instantiation
